FWC Logo Design

At Indiana University, I was part of the Fitness and Wellness Living-Learning Community. So, I volunteered to create a logo design for the t-shirts for that year.

Client: Fitness and Wellness Living-Learning Community
Project Type: Graphic Design
Responsibilities: Sketches, Logo Design
Date Completed: Fall 2013
FWC Logo Design
